    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChunkLoadEvent()
      Checks if an ball armorstand is inside of the chunk and spawns a ball at the location-
      void onChunkSaveEvent()
      Saves the ball asynchronously when it is inside of a chunk which gets unloaded. Replaces the entity with an invisible armorstands which holds the ball information for respawning.
      void onPlayerQuitEvent()
      Removes the ball of a player before he leaves the server.
      void onPlayerTeleportEvent()
      Removes the ball of a player before he teleports to another world
      void onWorldSaveEvent()
      Saves all balls from the world similar to chunk unload.
